verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w seals|strong="G4973"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* the \w noise|strong="G5456"\w* of \w thunder|strong="G1027"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Come|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G0991"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* a \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w horse|strong="G2462"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w bow|strong="G5115"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w conquering|strong="G3528"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w conquer|strong="G3528"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w seal|strong="G4973"\w*, I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w beast|strong="G2226"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Come|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G0991"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w horse|strong="G2462"\w* \add that was\add* \w red|strong="G4450"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add power\add* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w thereon|strong="G0846"\w* to \w take|strong="G2983"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w kill|strong="G4969"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w seal|strong="G4973"\w*, I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w beast|strong="G2226"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Come|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G0991"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w beheld|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lo|strong="G2400"\w* a \w black|strong="G3189"\w* \w horse|strong="G2462"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a pair of \w balances|strong="G2218"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, A \w measure|strong="G5518"\w* of \w wheat|strong="G4621"\w* for a \w penny|strong="G1220"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w measures|strong="G5518"\w* of \w barley|strong="G2915"\w* for a \w penny|strong="G1220"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add see\add* thou \w hurt|strong="G0091"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w oil|strong="G1637"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w fourth|strong="G5067"\w* \w seal|strong="G4973"\w*, I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of the \w fourth|strong="G5067"\w* \w beast|strong="G2226"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Come|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G0991"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w looked|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* a \w pale|strong="G5515"\w* \w horse|strong="G2462"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1883"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* was \w Death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Hell|strong="G0086"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* the fourth \w part|strong="G5067"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, to \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w sword|strong="G4501"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w hunger|strong="G3042"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* the \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w fifth|strong="G3991"\w* \w seal|strong="G4973"\w*, I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w under|strong="G5270"\w* the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w* the \w souls|strong="G5590"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that were \w slain|strong="G4969"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they \w held|strong="G2192"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w How|strong="G2193"\w* \w long|strong="G4219"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="G1203"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w*, dost \w thou|strong="G2919"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w avenge|strong="G1556"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w on|strong="G0575"\w* them that \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w robes|strong="G4749"\w* were \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto every one of \w them|strong="G1538"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w said|strong="G4483"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w rest|strong="G0373"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* for a \w little|strong="G3398"\w* \w season|strong="G5550"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w fellowservants|strong="G4889"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, that should be \w killed|strong="G0615"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \add were\add*, should \w be|strong="G3195"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w beheld|strong="G1492"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w seal|strong="G4973"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w black|strong="G3189"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="G4526"\w* of \w hair|strong="G5155"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w moon|strong="G4582"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w stars|strong="G0792"\w* of \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, even \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a fig \w tree|strong="G4808"\w* \w casteth|strong="G0906"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* untimely \w figs|strong="G3653"\w*, when she is \w shaken|strong="G4579"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* a \w mighty|strong="G3173"\w* \w wind|strong="G0417"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w departed|strong="G0673"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w scroll|strong="G0975"\w* when it is rolled \w together|strong="G1507"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w island|strong="G3520"\w* were \w moved|strong="G2795"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w places|strong="G5117"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w great|strong="G3175"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the rich \w men|strong="G4145"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w captains|strong="G5506"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the mighty \w men|strong="G1415"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w bondman|strong="G1401"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* free \w man|strong="G1658"\w*, \w hid|strong="G2928"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w dens|strong="G4693"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w rocks|strong="G4073"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* to the \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rocks|strong="G4073"\w*, \w Fall|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hide|strong="G2928"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w* of him that \w sitteth|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*:

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* shall be \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*?
